title: Bout India Tours Introduces Adventours in the Himalayas
text: Bout India Tours Pvt. Ltd Press Release Receive press releases from Bout India Tours Pvt. Ltd: By Email RSS Feeds: Bout India Tours Introduces Adventours in the Himalayas These new adventure tours offer easy and accessible trekking tours in the Himalayan Ranges. Now all the adventure lovers can explore the valleys of Himachal Pradesh, Uttarakhand and Leh-Ladakh with ease. Jaipur, India, September 11, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Bout India Tours Pvt Ltd has introduced the adventure tours in the Himalayan ranges. These well designed tours will offer an easy access to the valleys of Himachal Pradesh, Uttarakhand and Leh-Ladakh. Himalayas have fascinated the entire world for quite a while. Their altitude, climate, landscapes, flora and fauna are unique. Different people find different meanings of this place. To some it’s most romantic place, to some it’s very awe-inspiring and to some it’s highly spiritual."We are excited about our new adventours (Adventure + Tours). These tours are specifically designed to let you feel the surge of adrenaline inside you. There is lots of adventure activities like whitewater rafting, snow skiing, trekking, mountaineering, surfing, jungle safari, etc. included in these tours. We also have women’s only tours, coz’ why should boys have all the fun, right? To have fun with these tours, all you need is a good amount of adrenaline inside you,” said Mr. Himanshu Maru, Managing director (Co-Founder) of Bout India Tours. He added, "We believe that these new tours will bring the people close to Mother Earth and give them a sense of responsibility, love and compassion towards other living beings. These tours will give them a beautiful experience."Bout India is not only a tourism company but also a way to spread happiness. They believe that traveling to places of natural beauty & pleasant climate heals and nourishes the human soul.About Bout India Tours –Bout India is a registered legitimate tour company based at Jaipur, Rajasthan (India). They are specialist in designing tailor made tours for India Subcontinent. They have access to some great off beat locations which are not so much popular right now. Bout India has something for everyone, as they have designed amazingly large varieties of tours and experiences to suit all moods and life- styles which you can find on www.boutindia.comBout India team is proficient in handling complex itineraries with highly refined process, without any hassle. They are unique in their perception of tourism. They don't feel tourism as a business machine but a way to spread happiness. A change in environment has always been advised by doctors & psychiatrists to deal with depression or boredom. Medicines are for body, while traveling is for soul. It's because of this mindset, that they are able to give their client's an experience that they can cherish for lifetime. Contact Information Bout India Tours Pvt. Ltd.Charlie Rana
